amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings that the Paris Agreement is a treaty and should be treated as such.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 176).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
